name: Stories of Submission: eNTeR the cuck
name_original: Stories of Submission: eNTeR the cuck
description:
In the second installment of the Stories of Submission anthology we open on William who expects more from his new life after a year of being Mistress Freyja's servant. Freyja tells him the story of Alex and Stacy to remind him that being needy and demanding makes for a bad sub.

Alex is the spoiled man-child of rich parents who has never made anything of himself. Cripplingly self-aware, he can't maintain friendships or relationships and goes from one woman to the next. That all changes when he starts dating Stacy. For once, a woman sees past his pickup persona and doesn't leave him immediately. What Alex doesn't realize is that Stacy has a hidden side as well and she's about to teach him a cruel lesson.

Features:
■ A fascinating story about NTR/cuckoldry and the kind of pathetic men who crave it.
■ Numerous sex scenes where the main character only gets to watch or listen.
■ Several Endings. Which one's the 'good' ending is up to you.
